org.bouncycastle.pqc.jcajce.provider.rainbow

Class SignatureSpi

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.security.SignatureSpi
      • org.bouncycastle.pqc.jcajce.provider.rainbow.SignatureSpi
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SignatureSpi.withSha224, SignatureSpi.withSha256, SignatureSpi.withSha384, SignatureSpi.withSha512

    public class SignatureSpi
extends java.security.SignatureSpi
    Rainbow Signature class, extending the jce SignatureSpi.
